messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
What's the temperature in Grand Canyon in Fahrenheit

messages.name: search_location_around_lat_lon
messages.content: [{'phone_number': '+19286387888', 'name': 'Grand Canyon National Park', 'full_address': 'Grand Canyon National Park, Arizona', 'full_address_array': ['Arizona'], 'latitude': 36.2678855, 'longitude': -112.3535253, 'review_count': 62213, 'rating': 4.8, 'timezone': 'America/Phoenix', 'website': 'https://www.nps.gov/grca/index.htm', 'types': ['National park', 'Tourist attraction'], 'price_level': None, 'working_hours': {'Tuesday': ['Open 24 hours'], 'Wednesday': ['Open 24 hours'], 'Thursday': ['Open 24 hours'], 'Friday': ['Open 24 hours'], 'Saturday': ['Open 24 hours'], 'Sunday': ['Open 24 hours'], 'Monday': ['Open 24 hours']}, 'city': 'Arizona', 'is_claimed': True, 'state': 'Open 24 hours', 'description': ['Mile-deep landmark with panoramic vistas', 'Beyond its scenic overlooks, this mile-deep geologic wonder features hikes, mule rides & rafting.', None, 't', 't']}]

I have the exact location for the Grand Canyon National Park. Could you clarify whether you're asking for the current temperature, the average temperature for this time of year, or the expected high/low today? This will help me provide the most accurate information.
The current temperature would be great.

I currently don't have the ability to fetch real-time weather data, so I can't provide the exact current temperature for the Grand Canyon right now.

However, you can quickly check the current temperature in the Grand Canyon by searching "Grand Canyon current temperature" in a weather app or website like Weather.com or AccuWeather. Typically, temperatures at the South Rim in summer range from 70°F to 90°F during the day and can drop to 40°F or lower at night. If you need more detailed historical averages or advice for planning a visit, I'd be happy to help with that!
Got it, I'll check a weather app, thanks!
You’re welcome! If you have any other questions about the Grand Canyon or need help planning your visit, just let me know. Have a great day!
